What We Offer

A team-based approach to selling your home

List your home with Better Way Atlanta for a flat fee of $500. Your home is included on all the mulitple listing services (MLS) in Atlanta until it sells.

We come to your home and take pictures, provide a yard sign, and provide you templates to produce a real estate flyer to help you sell your house. When we leave your home â€“ it will be listed on the internet. Once you find potential buyers, we provide full agent representation from negotiation through closing.

The Better Way Difference

List Your House

Just contact Better Way Atlanta Realty and one of our licensed realtors will help you get your home listed on the MLS for just $500. We‘ll even send someone out to take pictures of your home to show with your listing.

Buyers Find You

According to the National Association of REALTORS®, over half of all home buyers find their new house online. Better Way Atlanta Realty give home owners the opportunity have their home seen by buyers across the internet.

Keep Your Money

Listing your house on the MLS thorugh Better Way Atlanta Realty costs you just $500. That means you keep an extra $3,000 for every $100,000 the buyer pays for your home.
